TopicTitle: Do you try and spin every image and video after playing Kerbal?

Articles.Content:
Every time I see an image from Kerbal or after I play it I always try and right click and swivel around an image or video. I wish I could move the camera around in 3d instead of being tethered to that middle pipe.

I cant upload a picture from my PC?
Yes. I frequently try to hold down the right mouse button to spin Youtube KSP videos...

Happens to me all the time.

I should get used to it by now : if I can hear Scott Manley's voice, then it's a video and I can't click...

Replays in KSP would be really cool...
It's the mark of a true KSP player.

Not just KSP videos for me. I've found that if I've been playing a new game all day and am now tired, I'll briefly look at something in my kitchen and half-expect a tooltip to inform me that the milk is a week past its expiration date.

Yes. I frequently try to hold down the right mouse button to spin Youtube KSP videos...

Same here. Or to mouse over something in a video or screenshot expecting a tooltip...
I catch myself doing this all too often.
